attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the FPTP system of election, replace it with STV, devolve powers to an English Parliament, devolve further powers to Wales, write a constitution, make Parliament more powerful, elect the Lords, elect EU Commissioners, set up a Public Appointments Commission, and many more things.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several existing ones. Please consider signing those, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
